name: Aveeno Skin Relief Fragrance Free Body Wash, Triple Oat Formula, Gentle Daily Cleanser for Itchy Dry Sensitive Skin, Soap & Paraben Free, Soothes & Moisturizes, 33 fl oz
short_description: Large, 33-fluid ounce bottle of Aveeno Skin Relief Fragrance-Free Body Wash for both women & men, dry & sensitive skin with a Triple Oat formula leaves itchy, dry skin feeling soothed & moisturized
The unique body wash formula is enriched with soothing Triple Oat blend made with oat flour, oat extract & oat oil to gently cleanse & help preserve skin's natural moisture barrier

From a dermatologist-recommended brand for over 70 years, the dry skin body wash is suitable for daily use. 93% of users agreed the moisturizing body wash left itchy, dry skin feeling soothed & moisturized
This skin relief body wash from a dermatologist recommended brand is allergy tested & formulated for sensitive skin. The gentle body wash is made free of fragrance, parabens, dye & soap

Use this sensitive skin body wash that soothes itchy, dry skin as a part of your daily skincare routine. After cleansing, follow with Aveeno Skin Relief Moisturizing Lotion to lock in moisture for 48 hours
product_description: Aveeno Skin Relief Moisturizing Body Wash is fragrance-free and suitable for sensitive skin. Formulated to provide gentle yet effective cleansing for itchy, dry, and sensitive skin. This moisturizing body wash features a Triple Oat Formula, combining oat flour, oat extract, and oat oil to help preserve the skin’s natural moisture barrier. An impressive 93% of users confirm this body wash leaves itchy, dry skin feeling soothed and moisturized. Designed for daily use by both men and women, this gentle daily cleanser is from a dermatologist-recommended brand for over 70 years. Allergy tested, making it ideal for those with sensitive or easily irritated skin seeking a body wash alternative. Free of soap, parabens, dyes, and fragrance-free formula ensures a mild cleansing experience without harsh chemicals. Its creamy, nourishing texture makes it suitable as a shower gel or body soap, and versatile enough to double as a rich shave gel for silky, smooth legs. Whether you’re looking for a women's body wash, men’s body wash, this product fits seamlessly into any daily skincare routine. For best results, squeeze onto a wet pouf, washcloth, or hands, work into a rich, creamy lather, then rinse. Follow with Aveeno Skin Relief Moisturizing Lotion to lock in moisture for 48 hours. Experience the body wash and lotion formula and enjoy skin that feels softer, smoother and leaves itchy, dry skin feeling soothed and moisturized.

name: Dove Body Wash with Pump Antibacterial For All Skin Types Protects from Dryness 30.6 oz
short_description: CARE & PROTECT: Dove Antibacterial Body Wash has a light gel texture and is made to effectively cleanse and eliminate 99% of bacteria all while giving long-lasting nourishment.
MOISTURE RENEW BLEND: Helps renew skin’s natural moisture and protects skin from dryness. What a concept!
SKIN-LOVING CLEANSERS: Long-lasting nourishment and softer skin, included.
SAY BYE TO DRY: Safe for all skin types - even you - dry skin, have nothing to worry about. You’ll be soft and smooth in no time.

THOUGHTFULLY MADE: Our body wash is vegan and Dove is PETA approved, meaning we do not test on animals anywhere in the world. Plus, it’s sulfate-free, paraben-free and packaged in 100% recycled bottles, so you can feel good about choosing Dove.
No.1 DERMATOLOGIST-RECOMMENDED BODY WASH BRAND: Get the best of both worlds (moisturized and clean skin) with the No. 1 dermatologist-recommended body wash brand.
product_description: Get out of here! Banish bacteria from your scared skingdom with our Dove Antibacterial Body Wash. Different from others, this hydrating gel formula gently yet effectively cleanses without drying out the skin, eliminates 99% of bacteria in one wash, and moisturizes 100% of your skin. We like those numbers. Our signature Moisture Renew Blend renews and locks in skin’s moisture and locks out harmful bacteria, leaving you with long-lasting nourishment and soft skin. Win-Win. And did we mention how it smells? The cleansing scent of sun-drenched citrus, delicate dewy florals and soft creamy woods will transport you to a seaside Sicilian garden. So basically, the formula is working overtime while your senses are Euro trippin’. To use this hydrating gel formula, squeeze into palms or loofah, work into a lather, spread over skin, rinse with warm water and step out of the shower feeling squeaky clean, and super soft. Who else would you trust, but the No.1 dermatologist-recommended brand (us!) to deliver a long-lasting, moisturizing body wash? Our Antibacterial Body Wash is vegan and Dove is PETA approved, meaning we do not test on animals anywhere in the world. Plus, it’s sulfate-free, paraben-free, and packaged in 100% recycled bottles. (*eliminates 99% of bacteria in a clinical wash test vs. E.coli)

It is free of parabens and phthalates. Directions: Simply lather with a puff and rinse. At Olay, we're serious about our commitments. Our Olay Skin Promise to you is zero skin retouching in all advertising. Olay is the first mass skin care brand in the U.S. to take this stance because we know real beauty is honestly beautiful. We also guarantee you'll love your Olay product. If you are not satisfied, we'll give you your money back via a prepaid card. Must submit within 60 days of purchase. name: Ivory Body Wash, Designed for the Whole Family, Gentle Formula, Free of Dyes Heavy Perfumes Parabens Phthalates & Silicones, Fragnance-Free, 35 oz
short_description: 10 PURPOSEFUL INGREDIENTS - Formulated with only 10 essential ingredients, Ivory Sensitive Body Wash is designed with the most delicate skin in mind
NEA Approved – Recognized by the National Eczema Association, this body wash provides gentle cleansing that helps soothe and nourish eczema-prone skin
PLANT BASED POWER – Made with plant-derived cleansers that are tough on dirt yet gentle on your skin
DERMATOLOGIST TESTED – All Ivory products have been dermatologist tested, ensuring the gentle quality you can trust for your daily skincare routine!
DESIGNED FOR SKIN’S pH – This body wash is designed to work with your skin’s natural pH, promoting a healthy, gentle wash that leaves your skin balanced and refreshed.

WHOLE FAMILY CARE – Formulated to be gentle enough for adults and kids ages three and up, our gentle cleansers ensure a soft touch for every skin type. Enjoy a caring and effective cleanse that everyone can feel good about.
product_description: Experience the gentle touch of Ivory Sensitive body wash, thoughtfully designed for the whole family (ages 3 and up). Formulated with just 10 purposeful ingredients and free from heavy perfumes, parabens, and phthalates, it’s the ideal choice for those seeking a natural clean for sensitive skin. Made with plant-based cleansers, this body wash effectively removes dirt and impurities while being kind to your skin, promoting a healthy, nourishing feel. Also designed to support your skin’s natural pH, this dermatologist-tested formula provides a gentle cleanse without stripping away essential moisture. Feel confident with Ivory! With over 140 years of family trust, Ivory is dedicated to delivering simple, effective products that care for both your skin and the environment. Proudly accepted by the National Eczema Association, Ivory Sensitive body wash is a suitable choice for those with eczema or sensitive skin. Choose Ivory for a cleansing experience that combines tradition, innovation, and gentle care.

short_description: Cleans, Soothes, and Protects – Infused with 100% pure tea tree oil, this body wash helps relieve itchiness, protect your skin, and soothe irritation caused by jock itch, eczema, psoriasis, acne, athlete’s foot, ringworm, and other common skin conditions.

Deep-Cleansing & Refreshing Wash for Face, Body & Feet – Tea tree oil body wash soap gently removes sweat, odor, and buildup from head to toe, protecting and purifying your skin. Ideal for anyone who wants to keep their skin healthy and clean, including athletes, gym users, and those with active lifestyles.

Gentle for Dry & Sensitive Skin – Formulated for daily use by men and women of all ages, from mature to younger skin. This gentle body wash helps hydrate, calm, and soothe skin without harsh sulfates, parabens, or artificial fragrances.

MaxTherapy Body Wash, 2-Pack Value – Enjoy lasting relief with our powerful formula made with pure tea tree oil and infused with botanical ingredients like aloe vera and eucalyptus oil to soothe, cleanse, and protect your skin.

Award-Winning & Made in USA with Organic Ingredients – Crafted with a blend of organic essential oils and plant-based ingredients. Proudly made in the USA to deliver clean, trusted skin care you can rely on.

short_description: Nourishing Body Wash: Cleanses, softens and nourishes skin with lasting moisture. The rich, creamy formula creates a silky lather that gently washes away dirt, oil and bacteria. Suitable for daily use and gentle enough for sensitive skin.
Signature Green Tea Lemongrass Scent: Our best-selling scent of green tea and herbaceous lemongrass intermingled with fresh ginger will leave you feeling calm and relaxed.

Naturally Derived Ingredients: Enriched with our special blend of vitamins, antioxidants and botanical extracts to protect and hydrate skin. Toxin-free formula is paraben, sulfate, phosphate and gluten-free.
Cruelty-Free Body Care: Ginger Lily Farms Botanicals is PETA-certified, 100% vegan and never tested on animals so you can feel good while using it.
Economical & Eco-Friendly: Gallon refill size helps reduce plastic consumption and is perfect for refilling shower dispensers in locker rooms, health clubs, spas or at home. 1 Gallon (128 fl. oz.)
product_description: Ginger Lily Farms Botanicals Island Tranquility Nourishing Body Wash delivers a powerful mix of moisturizing ingredients that leaves skin feeling nourished, healthy and refreshed. Formulated with pure essential oils of vetiver, nutmeg, lemon and orange and enriched with vitamin B5, aloe and flaxseed to soften, smooth and reinvigorate skin leaving your body deeply hydrated and refreshingly clean. Easily lathers on the skin to wash away dirt, oil and bacteria. Natural spa quality formula contains no harsh chemicals like parabens, sulfates, phosphates or gluten and is gentle enough for even the most sensitive skin. Ginger Lily Farms Botanicals Nourishing Body Wash is 100% vegan, cruelty-free and PETA certified so you can feel good while using it. Refill size is perfect for fitness centers, locker rooms, spas and home use. Directions: Apply Ginger Lily Farms Botanicals Nourishing Body Wash generously and massage into the skin. Rinse and repeat if necessary.
